00048 /* *** Platform dependent base types */
00049 
00050 /* Windows */
00051 #ifdef __orxWINDOWS__
00052 
00053   typedef void *                  orxHANDLE;
00054 
00055   #ifdef __orxX86_64__
00056 
00057   typedef unsigned  int           orxU32;
00058   typedef unsigned  short         orxU16;
00059   typedef unsigned  char          orxU8;
00060 
00061   typedef signed    int           orxS32;
00062   typedef signed    short         orxS16;
00063   typedef signed    char          orxS8;
00064 
00065   typedef unsigned  int           orxBOOL;
00066 
00067   #else /* __orxX86_64__ */
00068 
00069   typedef unsigned  long          orxU32;
00070   typedef unsigned  short         orxU16;
00071   typedef unsigned  char          orxU8;
00072 
00073   typedef signed    long          orxS32;
00074   typedef signed    short         orxS16;
00075   typedef signed    char          orxS8;
00076 
00077   typedef unsigned  long          orxBOOL;
00078 
00079   #endif /* __orxX86_64__ */
00080 
00081   typedef float                   orxFLOAT;
00082   typedef double                  orxDOUBLE;
00083 
00084   typedef char                    orxCHAR;
00085   #define orxSTRING               orxCHAR *
00086 
00087   typedef orxU32                  orxENUM;
00088 
00089   #define orx2F(V)                ((orxFLOAT)(V))
00090   #define orx2D(V)                ((orxDOUBLE)(V))
00091 
00092   #define orxENUM_NONE            0xFFFFFFFFL
00093 
00094   /* Compiler specific */
00095   #ifdef __orxGCC__
00096 
00097     typedef unsigned  long long   orxU64;
00098     typedef signed    long long   orxS64;
00099 
00100   #endif /* __orxGCC__ */
00101   #ifdef __orxMSVC__
00102 
00103     typedef unsigned  __int64     orxU64;
00104     typedef signed    __int64     orxS64;
00105 
00106   #endif /* __orxMSVC__ */
00107 
00108 #else /* __orxWINDOWS__ */
00109

00162 /* *** Misc constants *** */
00163 
00164 /* *** Boolean constants *** */
00165 #define orxFALSE                  ((orxBOOL)(1 != 1))
00166 #define orxTRUE                   ((orxBOOL)(1 == 1))
00167 
00168 
00169 /* *** Float constants *** */
00170 static const orxFLOAT             orxFLOAT_0            = orx2F(0.0f);
00171 static const orxFLOAT             orxFLOAT_1            = orx2F(1.0f);

00206 /* *** Status defines *** */
00207 typedef enum __orxSTATUS_t
00208 {
00209   orxSTATUS_FAILURE = 0,          
00210   orxSTATUS_SUCCESS,              
00212   orxSTATUS_NUMBER,               
00214   orxSTATUS_NONE = orxENUM_NONE
